charges.charge_description: 18:472 Possess and conceal falsely made and counterfeited obligations of U.S. w/intent to defraud (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 12 months imprisonment as to cts l &; 2 to run concurrent; 6 months to be served in FCI and 6 months monitored home confinement, dft responsible for cost of monitoring; supvd release: 3 yrs; Restit: $700; Spec Assessmt: $100. Dft released on bond and to self report. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:472 Pass &; utter and attempt to pass and utter falsely made and counterfeited obligations to U.S. w/intent to defraud (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 12 months imprisonment as to cts l &; 2 to run concurrent; 6 months to be served in FCI and 6 months monitored home confinement, dft responsible for cost of monitoring; supvd release: 3 yrs; Restit: $700; Spec Assessmt: $100. Dft released on bond and to self report. (2)
